testcase.name: connectTomsSql

error.message: The TCP/IP connection to the host WINCTRL-L53BSHI, port 1433 has failed. Error: "Connection refused: connect. Verify the connection properties. Make sure that an instance of SQL Server is running on the host and accepting TCP/IP connections at the port. Make sure that TCP connections to the port are not blocked by a firewall.".
